39#if ANGLE_ENABLE_METAL_SPIRV
40constexpr char kSpirvCrossSpecConstSuffix[] = "_tmp";
41#endif
42template <typename T>
43class ScopedAutoClearVector
44{
45 public:
46 ScopedAutoClearVector(std::vector<T> *array) : mArray(*array) {}
47 ~ScopedAutoClearVector() { mArray.clear(); }
48
49 private:
50 std::vector<T> &mArray;
51};
52
53angle::Result StreamUniformBufferData(ContextMtl *contextMtl,
54 mtl::BufferPool *dynamicBuffer,
55 const uint8_t *sourceData,
56 size_t bytesToAllocate,
57 size_t sizeToCopy,
58 mtl::BufferRef *bufferOut,
59 size_t *bufferOffsetOut)
60{
61 uint8_t *dst = nullptr;
62 dynamicBuffer->releaseInFlightBuffers(contextMtl);
63 ANGLE_TRY(dynamicBuffer->allocate(contextMtl, bytesToAllocate, &dst, bufferOut, bufferOffsetOut,
64 nullptr));
65 memcpy(dst, sourceData, sizeToCopy);
66
67 ANGLE_TRY(dynamicBuffer->commit(contextMtl));
68 return angle::Result::Continue;
69}
70
71void InitDefaultUniformBlock(const std::vector<sh::Uniform> &uniforms,
72 gl::Shader *shader,
73 sh::BlockLayoutMap *blockLayoutMapOut,
74 size_t *blockSizeOut)
75{
76 if (uniforms.empty())
77 {
78 *blockSizeOut = 0;
79 return;
80 }
81
82 sh::Std140BlockEncoder blockEncoder;
83 sh::GetActiveUniformBlockInfo(uniforms, "", &blockEncoder, blockLayoutMapOut);
84
85 size_t blockSize = blockEncoder.getCurrentOffset();
86
87 // TODO(jmadill): I think we still need a valid block for the pipeline even if zero sized.
88 if (blockSize == 0)
89 {
90 *blockSizeOut = 0;
91 return;
92 }
93
94 // Need to round up to multiple of vec4
95 *blockSizeOut = roundUp(blockSize, static_cast<size_t>(16));
96 return;
97}
98
99inline NSDictionary<NSString *, NSObject *> * getDefaultSubstitutionDictionary() {
100#if ANGLE_ENABLE_METAL_SPIRV
101 if (sh::readBoolEnvVar("ANGLE_GEN_MTL_WITH_SPIRV"))
102 {
103 return @{};
104 }
105 else
106#endif
107 {
108 return @{@"TRANSFORM_FEEDBACK_ENABLED": @"0"};
109 }
110}
111
112template <typename T>
113void UpdateDefaultUniformBlock(GLsizei count,
114 uint32_t arrayIndex,
115 int componentCount,
116 const T *v,
117 const sh::BlockMemberInfo &layoutInfo,
118 angle::MemoryBuffer *uniformData)
119{
120 const int elementSize = sizeof(T) * componentCount;
121
122 uint8_t *dst = uniformData->data() + layoutInfo.offset;
123 if (layoutInfo.arrayStride == 0 || layoutInfo.arrayStride == elementSize)
124 {
125 uint32_t arrayOffset = arrayIndex * layoutInfo.arrayStride;
126 uint8_t *writePtr = dst + arrayOffset;
127 ASSERT(writePtr + (elementSize * count) <= uniformData->data() + uniformData->size());
128 memcpy(writePtr, v, elementSize * count);
129 }
130 else
131 {
132 // Have to respect the arrayStride between each element of the array.
133 int maxIndex = arrayIndex + count;
134 for (int writeIndex = arrayIndex, readIndex = 0; writeIndex < maxIndex;
135 writeIndex++, readIndex++)
136 {
137 const int arrayOffset = writeIndex * layoutInfo.arrayStride;
138 uint8_t *writePtr = dst + arrayOffset;
139 const T *readPtr = v + (readIndex * componentCount);
140 ASSERT(writePtr + elementSize <= uniformData->data() + uniformData->size());
141 memcpy(writePtr, readPtr, elementSize);
142 }
143 }
144}
145
146template <typename T>
147void ReadFromDefaultUniformBlock(int componentCount,
148 uint32_t arrayIndex,
149 T *dst,
150 const sh::BlockMemberInfo &layoutInfo,
151 const angle::MemoryBuffer *uniformData)
152{
153 ASSERT(layoutInfo.offset != -1);
154
155 const int elementSize = sizeof(T) * componentCount;
156 const uint8_t *source = uniformData->data() + layoutInfo.offset;
157
158 if (layoutInfo.arrayStride == 0 || layoutInfo.arrayStride == elementSize)
159 {
160 const uint8_t *readPtr = source + arrayIndex * layoutInfo.arrayStride;
161 memcpy(dst, readPtr, elementSize);
162 }
163 else
164 {
165 // Have to respect the arrayStride between each element of the array.
166 const int arrayOffset = arrayIndex * layoutInfo.arrayStride;
167 const uint8_t *readPtr = source + arrayOffset;
168 memcpy(dst, readPtr, elementSize);
169 }
170}
171
172class Std140BlockLayoutEncoderFactory : public gl::CustomBlockLayoutEncoderFactory
173{
174 public:
175 sh::BlockLayoutEncoder *makeEncoder() override { return new sh::Std140BlockEncoder(); }
176};
177
178void InitArgumentBufferEncoder(mtl::Context *context,
179 id<MTLFunction> function,
180 uint32_t bufferIndex,
181 ProgramArgumentBufferEncoderMtl *encoder)
182{
183 encoder->metalArgBufferEncoder = [function newArgumentEncoderWithBufferIndex:bufferIndex];
184 if (encoder->metalArgBufferEncoder)
185 {
186 encoder->bufferPool.initialize(context, encoder->metalArgBufferEncoder.get().encodedLength,
187 mtl::kArgumentBufferOffsetAlignment, 0);
188 }
189}
190
191} // namespace
192
193// ProgramArgumentBufferEncoderMtl implementation
194void ProgramArgumentBufferEncoderMtl::reset(ContextMtl *contextMtl)
195{
196 metalArgBufferEncoder = nil;
197 bufferPool.destroy(contextMtl);
198}
199
200// ProgramShaderObjVariantMtl implementation
201void ProgramShaderObjVariantMtl::reset(ContextMtl *contextMtl)
202{
203 metalShader = nil;
204
205 uboArgBufferEncoder.reset(contextMtl);
206
207 translatedSrcInfo = nullptr;
208}
209
210// ProgramMtl implementation
211ProgramMtl::DefaultUniformBlock::DefaultUniformBlock() {}
212
213ProgramMtl::DefaultUniformBlock::~DefaultUniformBlock() = default;
214
215ProgramMtl::ProgramMtl(const gl::ProgramState &state) : ProgramImpl(state),
216 mMetalRenderPipelineCache(this),
217 mAuxBufferPool(nullptr),
218 mHasFlatAttribute(false)
219{
220 mMetalXfbRenderPipelineCache = new mtl::RenderPipelineCache(this);
221}
222
223ProgramMtl::~ProgramMtl()
224{
225 delete mMetalXfbRenderPipelineCache;
226}
227
228void ProgramMtl::destroy(const gl::Context *context)
229{
230 auto contextMtl = mtl::GetImpl(context);
231 if(mAuxBufferPool)
232 {
233 mAuxBufferPool->destroy(contextMtl);
234 delete mAuxBufferPool;
235 mAuxBufferPool = nullptr;
236 }
237 reset(contextMtl);
238}
239
240void ProgramMtl::reset(ContextMtl *context)
241{
242 for (auto &block : mDefaultUniformBlocks)
243 {
244 block.uniformLayout.clear();
245 }
246
247 for (gl::ShaderType shaderType : gl::AllShaderTypes())
248 {
249 mMslShaderTranslateInfo[shaderType].reset();
250 mCurrentShaderVariants[shaderType] = nullptr;
251 }
252 mMslXfbOnlyVertexShaderInfo.reset();
253
254 for (ProgramShaderObjVariantMtl &var : mVertexShaderVariants)
255 {
256 var.reset(context);
257 }
258 for (ProgramShaderObjVariantMtl &var : mFragmentShaderVariants)
259 {
260 var.reset(context);
261 }
262 if(mAuxBufferPool)
263 {
264 if(mAuxBufferPool->reset(context, mtl::kDefaultUniformsMaxSize*2, mtl::kUniformBufferSettingOffsetMinAlignment,3) != angle::Result::Continue)
265 {
266 mAuxBufferPool->destroy(context);
267 delete mAuxBufferPool;
268 mAuxBufferPool = nullptr;
269 }
270 }
271 mMetalRenderPipelineCache.clear();
272 mMetalXfbRenderPipelineCache->clear();
273}
274
275void ProgramMtl::saveTranslatedShaders(gl::BinaryOutputStream *stream)
276{
277 // Write out shader sources for all shader types
278 for (const gl::ShaderType shaderType : gl::AllShaderTypes())
279 {
280 stream->writeString(mMslShaderTranslateInfo[shaderType].metalShaderSource);
281 }
282 for (size_t xfbBindIndex = 0; xfbBindIndex < mtl::kMaxShaderXFBs; xfbBindIndex++)
283 {
284 stream->writeInt(mXfbBindings[xfbBindIndex]);
285 }
286}
287
288void ProgramMtl::loadTranslatedShaders(gl::BinaryInputStream *stream)
289{
290 // Read in shader sources for all shader types
291 for (const gl::ShaderType shaderType : gl::AllShaderTypes())
292 {
293 mMslShaderTranslateInfo[shaderType].metalShaderSource = stream->readString();
294 }
295 for (size_t xfbBindIndex = 0; xfbBindIndex < mtl::kMaxShaderXFBs; xfbBindIndex++)
296 {
297 stream->readInt(&mXfbBindings[xfbBindIndex]);
298 }
299}
300
301std::unique_ptr<rx::LinkEvent> ProgramMtl::load(const gl::Context *context,
302 gl::BinaryInputStream *stream,
303 gl::InfoLog &infoLog)
304{
305
306 return std::make_unique<LinkEventDone>(linkTranslatedShaders(context, stream, infoLog));
307}
308
309void ProgramMtl::save(const gl::Context *context, gl::BinaryOutputStream *stream)
310{
311 saveTranslatedShaders(stream);
312 saveShaderInternalInfo(stream);
313 saveDefaultUniformBlocksInfo(stream);
314}
315
316
317void ProgramMtl::setBinaryRetrievableHint(bool retrievable)
318{
319 UNIMPLEMENTED();
320}
321
322void ProgramMtl::setSeparable(bool separable)
323{
324 UNIMPLEMENTED();
325}
326
327std::unique_ptr<LinkEvent> ProgramMtl::link(const gl::Context *context,
328 const gl::ProgramLinkedResources &resources,
329 gl::InfoLog &infoLog,
330 const gl::ProgramMergedVaryings &mergedVaryings)
331{
332 // Link resources before calling GetShaderSource to make sure they are ready for the set/binding
333 // assignment done in that function.
334 linkResources(resources);
335
336 // NOTE(hqle): Parallelize linking.
337 return std::make_unique<LinkEventDone>(linkImpl(context, resources, infoLog));
338}
339
340#if ANGLE_ENABLE_METAL_SPIRV
341angle::Result ProgramMtl::linkImplSpirv(const gl::Context *glContext,
342 const gl::ProgramLinkedResources &resources,
343 gl::InfoLog &infoLog)
344{
345 ContextMtl *contextMtl = mtl::GetImpl(glContext);
346 // NOTE(hqle): No transform feedbacks for now, since we only support ES 2.0 atm
347
348 reset(contextMtl);
349
350 ANGLE_TRY(initDefaultUniformBlocks(glContext));
351
352 // Gather variable info and transform sources.
353 gl::ShaderMap<std::string> shaderSources;
354 gl::ShaderMap<std::string> xfbOnlyShaderSources;
355 ShaderMapInterfaceVariableInfoMap variableInfoMap;
356 ShaderMapInterfaceVariableInfoMap xfbOnlyVariableInfoMap;
357 mtl::GlslangGetShaderSource(mState, resources, &shaderSources,
358 &xfbOnlyShaderSources[gl::ShaderType::Vertex], &variableInfoMap,
359 &xfbOnlyVariableInfoMap[gl::ShaderType::Vertex]);
360
361 // Convert GLSL to spirv code
362 gl::ShaderMap<std::vector<uint32_t>> shaderCodes;
363 gl::ShaderMap<std::vector<uint32_t>> xfbOnlyShaderCodes; // only vertex shader is needed.
364 ANGLE_TRY(mtl::GlslangGetShaderSpirvCode(
365 contextMtl, mState.getExecutable().getLinkedShaderStages(), contextMtl->getCaps(),
366 shaderSources, variableInfoMap, &shaderCodes));
367
368 if (!mState.getLinkedTransformFeedbackVaryings().empty())
369 {
370 gl::ShaderBitSet onlyVS;
371 onlyVS.set(gl::ShaderType::Vertex);
372 ANGLE_TRY(mtl::GlslangGetShaderSpirvCode(contextMtl, onlyVS, contextMtl->getCaps(),
373 xfbOnlyShaderSources, xfbOnlyVariableInfoMap,
374 &xfbOnlyShaderCodes));
375 }
376
377 // Convert spirv code to MSL
378 ANGLE_TRY(mtl::SpirvCodeToMsl(contextMtl, mState,
379 xfbOnlyVariableInfoMap[gl::ShaderType::Vertex], &shaderCodes,
380 &xfbOnlyShaderCodes[gl::ShaderType::Vertex],
381 &mMslShaderTranslateInfo, &mMslXfbOnlyVertexShaderInfo));
382
383 for (gl::ShaderType shaderType : gl::AllGLES2ShaderTypes())
384 {
385 // Create actual Metal shader library
386 ANGLE_TRY(createMslShaderLib(contextMtl, shaderType, infoLog,
387 &mMslShaderTranslateInfo[shaderType], getDefaultSubstitutionDictionary()));
388 }
389
390 return angle::Result::Continue;
391}
392#endif
393
394angle::Result ProgramMtl::linkImplDirect(const gl::Context *glContext,
395 const gl::ProgramLinkedResources &resources,
396 gl::InfoLog &infoLog)
397{
398 ContextMtl *contextMtl = mtl::GetImpl(glContext);
399
400 reset(contextMtl);
401 ANGLE_TRY(initDefaultUniformBlocks(glContext));
402 ShaderMapInterfaceVariableInfoMap variableInfoMap;
403
404 gl::ShaderMap<std::string> shaderSources;
405 gl::ShaderMap<std::string> translatedMslShaders;
406 mtl::MSLGetShaderSource(mState, resources, &shaderSources, &variableInfoMap);
407
408 ANGLE_TRY(mtl::GlslangGetMSL(glContext, mState, contextMtl->getCaps(), shaderSources,
409 variableInfoMap, &mMslShaderTranslateInfo,
410 &translatedMslShaders,
411 mState.getExecutable().getTransformFeedbackBufferCount()));
412
413 for (gl::ShaderType shaderType : gl::AllGLES2ShaderTypes())
414 {
415 // Create actual Metal shader
416 ANGLE_TRY(
417 createMslShaderLib(contextMtl, shaderType, infoLog, &mMslShaderTranslateInfo[shaderType], getDefaultSubstitutionDictionary()));
418 }
419 // Save this, could be reset on shader destruction. These values will eventually be written out and restored in
420 // saveTranslatedShaders/loadTranslatedShaders
421 mXfbBindings = mMslShaderTranslateInfo[gl::ShaderType::Vertex].actualXFBBindings;
422 return angle::Result::Continue;
423}
424
425bool ProgramMtl::programHasFlatAttributes() const
426{
427 const auto & programInputs = mState.getProgramInputs();
428 for(auto & attribute : programInputs)
429 {
430 if(attribute.interpolation == sh::INTERPOLATION_FLAT)
431 return true;
432 }
433 const auto & flatVaryings = mState.getAttachedShader(gl::ShaderType::Vertex)->getOutputVaryings();
434 for(auto & attribute : flatVaryings)
435 {
436 if(attribute.interpolation == sh::INTERPOLATION_FLAT)
437 return true;
438 }
439
440 return false;
441}
442
443angle::Result ProgramMtl::linkImpl(const gl::Context *glContext,
444 const gl::ProgramLinkedResources &resources,
445 gl::InfoLog &infoLog)
446{
447#if ANGLE_ENABLE_METAL_SPIRV
448 if (sh::readBoolEnvVar("ANGLE_GEN_MTL_WITH_SPIRV"))
449 {
450 ANGLE_TRY(linkImplSpirv(glContext, resources, infoLog);
451 }
452 else
453#endif
454 {
455 ANGLE_TRY(linkImplDirect(glContext, resources, infoLog));
456 }
457 mHasFlatAttribute = programHasFlatAttributes();
458 return angle::Result::Continue;
459}
460
461
462angle::Result ProgramMtl::linkTranslatedShaders(const gl::Context *glContext,
463 gl::BinaryInputStream *stream,
464 gl::InfoLog &infoLog)
465{
466 ContextMtl *contextMtl = mtl::GetImpl(glContext);
467 // NOTE(hqle): No transform feedbacks for now, since we only support ES 2.0 atm
468
469 reset(contextMtl);
470
471 loadTranslatedShaders(stream);
472 loadShaderInternalInfo(stream);
473 ANGLE_TRY(loadDefaultUniformBlocksInfo(glContext, stream));
474
475 ANGLE_TRY(createMslShaderLib(contextMtl, gl::ShaderType::Vertex, infoLog,
476 &mMslShaderTranslateInfo[gl::ShaderType::Vertex], getDefaultSubstitutionDictionary()));
477 ANGLE_TRY(createMslShaderLib(contextMtl, gl::ShaderType::Fragment, infoLog,
478 &mMslShaderTranslateInfo[gl::ShaderType::Fragment], getDefaultSubstitutionDictionary()));
479 mHasFlatAttribute = programHasFlatAttributes();
480 return angle::Result::Continue;
481}
482
483
484mtl::BufferPool * ProgramMtl::getBufferPool(ContextMtl * context)
485{
486 if(mAuxBufferPool == nullptr)
487 {
488 mAuxBufferPool = new mtl::BufferPool(true);
489 mAuxBufferPool->initialize(context, mtl::kDefaultUniformsMaxSize*2, mtl::kUniformBufferSettingOffsetMinAlignment, 3);
490 }
491 return mAuxBufferPool;
492}
493void ProgramMtl::linkResources(const gl::ProgramLinkedResources &resources)
494{
495 Std140BlockLayoutEncoderFactory std140EncoderFactory;
496 gl::ProgramLinkedResourcesLinker linker(&std140EncoderFactory);
497
498 linker.linkResources(mState, resources);
499}
500
501angle::Result ProgramMtl::initDefaultUniformBlocks(const gl::Context *glContext)
502{
503 // Process vertex and fragment uniforms into std140 packing.
504 gl::ShaderMap<sh::BlockLayoutMap> layoutMap;
505 gl::ShaderMap<size_t> requiredBufferSize;
506 requiredBufferSize.fill(0);
507
508 for (gl::ShaderType shaderType : gl::AllGLES2ShaderTypes())
509 {
510 gl::Shader *shader = mState.getAttachedShader(shaderType);
511 if (shader)
512 {
513 const std::vector<sh::Uniform> &uniforms = shader->getUniforms();
514 InitDefaultUniformBlock(uniforms, shader, &layoutMap[shaderType],
515 &requiredBufferSize[shaderType]);
516 }
517 }
518
519 // Init the default block layout info.
520 const auto &uniforms = mState.getUniforms();
521 const auto &uniformLocations = mState.getUniformLocations();
522 for (size_t locSlot = 0; locSlot < uniformLocations.size(); ++locSlot)
523 {
524 const gl::VariableLocation &location = uniformLocations[locSlot];
525 gl::ShaderMap<sh::BlockMemberInfo> layoutInfo;
526
527 if (location.used() && !location.ignored)
528 {
529 const gl::LinkedUniform &uniform = uniforms[location.index];
530 if (uniform.isInDefaultBlock() && !uniform.isSampler())
531 {
532 std::string uniformName = uniform.name;
533 if (uniform.isArray())
534 {
535 // Gets the uniform name without the [0] at the end.
536 uniformName = gl::ParseResourceName(uniformName, nullptr);
537 }
538
539 bool found = false;
540
541 for (gl::ShaderType shaderType : gl::AllGLES2ShaderTypes())
542 {
543 auto it = layoutMap[shaderType].find(uniformName);
544 if (it != layoutMap[shaderType].end())
545 {
546 found = true;
547 layoutInfo[shaderType] = it->second;
548 }
549 }
550
551 ASSERT(found);
552 }
553 }
554
555 for (gl::ShaderType shaderType : gl::AllGLES2ShaderTypes())
556 {
557 mDefaultUniformBlocks[shaderType].uniformLayout.push_back(layoutInfo[shaderType]);
558 }
559 }
560
561 return resizeDefaultUniformBlocksMemory(glContext, requiredBufferSize);
562}
563
564angle::Result ProgramMtl::resizeDefaultUniformBlocksMemory(
565 const gl::Context *glContext,
566 const gl::ShaderMap<size_t> &requiredBufferSize)
567{
568 ContextMtl *contextMtl = mtl::GetImpl(glContext);
569
570 for (gl::ShaderType shaderType : gl::AllGLES2ShaderTypes())
571 {
572 if (requiredBufferSize[shaderType] > 0)
573 {
574 if (!mDefaultUniformBlocks[shaderType].uniformData.resize(
575 requiredBufferSize[shaderType]))
576 {
577 ANGLE_MTL_CHECK(contextMtl, false, GL_OUT_OF_MEMORY);
578 }
579
580 // Initialize uniform buffer memory to zero by default.
581 mDefaultUniformBlocks[shaderType].uniformData.fill(0);
582 mDefaultUniformBlocksDirty.set(shaderType);
583 }
584 }
585
586 return angle::Result::Continue;
587}
588
589angle::Result ProgramMtl::getSpecializedShader(mtl::Context *context,
590 gl::ShaderType shaderType,
591 const mtl::RenderPipelineDesc &renderPipelineDesc,
592 id<MTLFunction> *shaderOut)
593{
594 static_assert(YES == 1, "YES should have value of 1");
595 #if ANGLE_ENABLE_METAL_SPIRV
596 static const bool useSpirv = sh::readBoolEnvVar("ANGLE_GEN_MTL_WITH_SPIRV");
597 #endif
598
599 mtl::TranslatedShaderInfo *translatedMslInfo = &mMslShaderTranslateInfo[shaderType];
600 ProgramShaderObjVariantMtl *shaderVariant;
601 MTLFunctionConstantValues *funcConstants = nil;
602
603 if (shaderType == gl::ShaderType::Vertex)
604 {
605 // For vertex shader, we need to create 3 variants, one with emulated rasterization
606 // discard, one with true rasterization discard and one without.
607 shaderVariant = &mVertexShaderVariants[renderPipelineDesc.rasterizationType];
608 if (shaderVariant->metalShader)
609 {
610 // Already created.
611 *shaderOut = shaderVariant->metalShader;
612 return angle::Result::Continue;
613 }
614
615 ANGLE_MTL_OBJC_SCOPE
616 {
617 BOOL emulateDiscard = renderPipelineDesc.rasterizationType ==
618 mtl::RenderPipelineRasterization::EmulatedDiscard;
619
620 NSString *discardEnabledStr;
621#if ANGLE_ENABLE_METAL_SPIRV
622 if (useSpirv)
623 {
624 discardEnabledStr = [NSString
625 stringWithFormat:@"%s%s",
626 sh::TranslatorMetal::GetRasterizationDiscardEnabledConstName(),
627 kSpirvCrossSpecConstSuffix];
628 }
629 else
630#endif
631 {
632 discardEnabledStr =
633 [NSString stringWithUTF8String:sh::TranslatorMetalDirect::
634 GetRasterizationDiscardEnabledConstName()];
635 }
636
637 funcConstants = [[MTLFunctionConstantValues alloc] init];
638 [funcConstants setConstantValue:&emulateDiscard
639 type:MTLDataTypeBool
640 withName:discardEnabledStr];
641 }
642 } // if (shaderType == gl::ShaderType::Vertex)
643 else if (shaderType == gl::ShaderType::Fragment)
644 {
645 // For fragment shader, we need to create 2 variants, one with sample coverage mask
646 // disabled, one with the mask enabled.
647 BOOL emulateCoverageMask = renderPipelineDesc.emulateCoverageMask;
648 shaderVariant = &mFragmentShaderVariants[emulateCoverageMask];
649 if (shaderVariant->metalShader)
650 {
651 // Already created.
652 *shaderOut = shaderVariant->metalShader;
653 return angle::Result::Continue;
654 }
655
656 ANGLE_MTL_OBJC_SCOPE
657 {
658 NSString *coverageMaskEnabledStr;
659#if ANGLE_ENABLE_METAL_SPIRV
660 if (useSpirv)
661 {
662 coverageMaskEnabledStr = [NSString
663 stringWithFormat:@"%s%s",
664 sh::TranslatorMetal::GetCoverageMaskEnabledConstName(),
665 kSpirvCrossSpecConstSuffix];
666 }
667 else
668#endif
669 {
670 coverageMaskEnabledStr =
671 [NSString stringWithUTF8String:sh::TranslatorMetalDirect::
672 GetCoverageMaskEnabledConstName()];
673 }
674
675 funcConstants = [[MTLFunctionConstantValues alloc] init];
676 [funcConstants setConstantValue:&emulateCoverageMask
677 type:MTLDataTypeBool
678 withName:coverageMaskEnabledStr];
679
680 }
681
682 } // gl::ShaderType::Fragment
683 else
684 {
685 UNREACHABLE();
686 return angle::Result::Stop;
687 }
688 [funcConstants setConstantValue:&(context->getDisplay()->getFeatures().allowSamplerCompareGradient.enabled)
689 type:MTLDataTypeBool
690 withName:@"ANGLE_UseSampleCompareGradient"];
691 [funcConstants setConstantValue:&(context->getDisplay()->getFeatures().allowSamplerCompareLod.enabled)
692 type:MTLDataTypeBool
693 withName:@"ANGLE_UseSampleCompareLod"];
694 // Create Metal shader object
695 ANGLE_MTL_OBJC_SCOPE
696 {
697 ANGLE_TRY(CreateMslShader(context, translatedMslInfo->metalLibrary, SHADER_ENTRY_NAME, funcConstants,
698 &shaderVariant->metalShader));
699 [funcConstants ANGLE_MTL_AUTORELEASE];
700 }
701
702 // Store reference to the translated source for easily querying mapped bindings later.
703 shaderVariant->translatedSrcInfo = translatedMslInfo;
704
705 // Initialize argument buffer encoder if required
706 if (translatedMslInfo->hasUBOArgumentBuffer)
707 {
708 InitArgumentBufferEncoder(context, shaderVariant->metalShader,
709 mtl::kUBOArgumentBufferBindingIndex,
710 &shaderVariant->uboArgBufferEncoder);
711 }
712
713 *shaderOut = shaderVariant->metalShader;
714
715 return angle::Result::Continue;
716}
717
718bool ProgramMtl::hasSpecializedShader(gl::ShaderType shaderType,
719 const mtl::RenderPipelineDesc &renderPipelineDesc)
720{
721 return true;
722}
723
724angle::Result ProgramMtl::createMslShaderLib(mtl::Context *context,
725 gl::ShaderType shaderType,
726 gl::InfoLog &infoLog,
727 mtl::TranslatedShaderInfo *translatedMslInfo,
728 NSDictionary<NSString *, NSObject *> * substitutionMacros)
729{
730 ANGLE_MTL_OBJC_SCOPE
731 {
732 DisplayMtl *display = context->getDisplay();
733 id<MTLDevice> mtlDevice = display->getMetalDevice();
734
735 // Convert to actual binary shader
736 mtl::AutoObjCPtr<NSError *> err = nil;
737 translatedMslInfo->metalLibrary =
738 mtl::CreateShaderLibrary(mtlDevice, translatedMslInfo->metalShaderSource, substitutionMacros, &err);
739 if (err && !translatedMslInfo->metalLibrary)
740 {
741 std::ostringstream ss;
742 ss << "Internal error compiling shader with Metal backend.\n";
743 #if !defined(NDEBUG)
744 ss << err.get().localizedDescription.UTF8String << "\n";
745 #else
746 ss << "Please submit this shader, or website as a bug to https://bugs.webkit.org\n";
747 #endif
748 ERR() << ss.str();
749
750 infoLog << ss.str();
751
752 ANGLE_MTL_CHECK(context, false, GL_INVALID_OPERATION);
753 }
754
755 return angle::Result::Continue;
756 }
757}
758
759void ProgramMtl::saveDefaultUniformBlocksInfo(gl::BinaryOutputStream *stream)
760{
761 // Serializes the uniformLayout data of mDefaultUniformBlocks
762 for (gl::ShaderType shaderType : gl::AllShaderTypes())
763 {
764 const size_t uniformCount = mDefaultUniformBlocks[shaderType].uniformLayout.size();
765 stream->writeInt<size_t>(uniformCount);
766 for (unsigned int uniformIndex = 0; uniformIndex < uniformCount; ++uniformIndex)
767 {
768 sh::BlockMemberInfo &blockInfo =
769 mDefaultUniformBlocks[shaderType].uniformLayout[uniformIndex];
770 gl::WriteBlockMemberInfo(stream, blockInfo);
771 }
772 }
773
774 // Serializes required uniform block memory sizes
775 for (gl::ShaderType shaderType : gl::AllShaderTypes())
776 {
777 stream->writeInt(mDefaultUniformBlocks[shaderType].uniformData.size());
778 }
779}
780
781angle::Result ProgramMtl::loadDefaultUniformBlocksInfo(const gl::Context *glContext,
782 gl::BinaryInputStream *stream)
783{
784 gl::ShaderMap<size_t> requiredBufferSize;
785 requiredBufferSize.fill(0);
786
787 // Deserializes the uniformLayout data of mDefaultUniformBlocks
788 for (gl::ShaderType shaderType : gl::AllShaderTypes())
789 {
790 const size_t uniformCount = stream->readInt<size_t>();
791 for (unsigned int uniformIndex = 0; uniformIndex < uniformCount; ++uniformIndex)
792 {
793 sh::BlockMemberInfo blockInfo;
794 gl::LoadBlockMemberInfo(stream, &blockInfo);
795 mDefaultUniformBlocks[shaderType].uniformLayout.push_back(blockInfo);
796 }
797 }
798
799 // Deserializes required uniform block memory sizes
800 for (gl::ShaderType shaderType : gl::AllShaderTypes())
801 {
802 requiredBufferSize[shaderType] = stream->readInt<size_t>();
803 }
804
805 return resizeDefaultUniformBlocksMemory(glContext, requiredBufferSize);
806}
807
808void ProgramMtl::saveShaderInternalInfo(gl::BinaryOutputStream *stream)
809{
810 for (gl::ShaderType shaderType : gl::AllShaderTypes())
811 {
812 stream->writeInt<int>(mMslShaderTranslateInfo[shaderType].hasUBOArgumentBuffer);
813 for (const mtl::SamplerBinding &binding :
814 mMslShaderTranslateInfo[shaderType].actualSamplerBindings)
815 {
816 stream->writeInt<uint32_t>(binding.textureBinding);
817 stream->writeInt<uint32_t>(binding.samplerBinding);
818 }
819
820 for (uint32_t uboBinding : mMslShaderTranslateInfo[shaderType].actualUBOBindings)
821 {
822 stream->writeInt<uint32_t>(uboBinding);
823 }
824 }
825}
826
827void ProgramMtl::loadShaderInternalInfo(gl::BinaryInputStream *stream)
828{
829 for (gl::ShaderType shaderType : gl::AllShaderTypes())
830 {
831 mMslShaderTranslateInfo[shaderType].hasUBOArgumentBuffer = stream->readInt<int>() != 0;
832 for (mtl::SamplerBinding &binding :
833 mMslShaderTranslateInfo[shaderType].actualSamplerBindings)
834 {
835 binding.textureBinding = stream->readInt<uint32_t>();
836 binding.samplerBinding = stream->readInt<uint32_t>();
837 }
838
839 for (uint32_t &uboBinding : mMslShaderTranslateInfo[shaderType].actualUBOBindings)
840 {
841 uboBinding = stream->readInt<uint32_t>();
842 }
843 }
844}
845
846GLboolean ProgramMtl::validate(const gl::Caps &caps, gl::InfoLog *infoLog)
847{
848 // No-op. The spec is very vague about the behavior of validation.
849 return GL_TRUE;
850}
851
852template <typename T>
853void ProgramMtl::setUniformImpl(GLint location, GLsizei count, const T *v, GLenum entryPointType)
854{
855 const gl::VariableLocation &locationInfo = mState.getUniformLocations()[location];
856 const gl::LinkedUniform &linkedUniform = mState.getUniforms()[locationInfo.index];
857
858 if (linkedUniform.isSampler())
859 {
860 // Sampler binding has changed.
861 mSamplerBindingsDirty.set();
862 return;
863 }
864
865 if (linkedUniform.typeInfo->type == entryPointType)
866 {
867 for (gl::ShaderType shaderType : gl::AllGLES2ShaderTypes())
868 {
869 DefaultUniformBlock &uniformBlock = mDefaultUniformBlocks[shaderType];
870 const sh::BlockMemberInfo &layoutInfo = uniformBlock.uniformLayout[location];
871
872 // Assume an offset of -1 means the block is unused.
873 if (layoutInfo.offset == -1)
874 {
875 continue;
876 }
877
878 const GLint componentCount = linkedUniform.typeInfo->componentCount;
879 UpdateDefaultUniformBlock(count, locationInfo.arrayIndex, componentCount, v, layoutInfo,
880 &uniformBlock.uniformData);
881 mDefaultUniformBlocksDirty.set(shaderType);
882 }
883 }
884 else
885 {
886 for (gl::ShaderType shaderType : gl::AllGLES2ShaderTypes())
887 {
888 DefaultUniformBlock &uniformBlock = mDefaultUniformBlocks[shaderType];
889 const sh::BlockMemberInfo &layoutInfo = uniformBlock.uniformLayout[location];
890
891 // Assume an offset of -1 means the block is unused.
892 if (layoutInfo.offset == -1)
893 {
894 continue;
895 }
896
897 const GLint componentCount = linkedUniform.typeInfo->componentCount;
898
899 ASSERT(linkedUniform.typeInfo->type == gl::VariableBoolVectorType(entryPointType));
900
901 GLint initialArrayOffset =
902 locationInfo.arrayIndex * layoutInfo.arrayStride + layoutInfo.offset;
903 for (GLint i = 0; i < count; i++)
904 {
905 GLint elementOffset = i * layoutInfo.arrayStride + initialArrayOffset;
906 GLint *dest =
907 reinterpret_cast<GLint *>(uniformBlock.uniformData.data() + elementOffset);
908 const T *source = v + i * componentCount;
909
910 for (int c = 0; c < componentCount; c++)
911 {
912 dest[c] = (source[c] == static_cast<T>(0)) ? GL_FALSE : GL_TRUE;
913 }
914 }
915
916 mDefaultUniformBlocksDirty.set(shaderType);
917 }
918 }
919}
920
921template <typename T>
922void ProgramMtl::getUniformImpl(GLint location, T *v, GLenum entryPointType) const
923{
924 const gl::VariableLocation &locationInfo = mState.getUniformLocations()[location];
925 const gl::LinkedUniform &linkedUniform = mState.getUniforms()[locationInfo.index];
926
927 ASSERT(!linkedUniform.isSampler());
928
929 const gl::ShaderType shaderType = linkedUniform.getFirstShaderTypeWhereActive();
930 ASSERT(shaderType != gl::ShaderType::InvalidEnum);
931
932 const DefaultUniformBlock &uniformBlock = mDefaultUniformBlocks[shaderType];
933 const sh::BlockMemberInfo &layoutInfo = uniformBlock.uniformLayout[location];
934
935 ASSERT(linkedUniform.typeInfo->componentType == entryPointType ||
936 linkedUniform.typeInfo->componentType == gl::VariableBoolVectorType(entryPointType));
937
938 if (gl::IsMatrixType(linkedUniform.type))
939 {
940 const uint8_t *ptrToElement = uniformBlock.uniformData.data() + layoutInfo.offset +
941 (locationInfo.arrayIndex * layoutInfo.arrayStride);
942 GetMatrixUniform(linkedUniform.type, v, reinterpret_cast<const T *>(ptrToElement), false);
943 }
944 else
945 {
946 ReadFromDefaultUniformBlock(linkedUniform.typeInfo->componentCount, locationInfo.arrayIndex,
947 v, layoutInfo, &uniformBlock.uniformData);
948 }
949}
950
951void ProgramMtl::setUniform1fv(GLint location, GLsizei count, const GLfloat *v)
952{
953 setUniformImpl(location, count, v, GL_FLOAT);
954}

1010
1011template <int cols, int rows>
1012void ProgramMtl::setUniformMatrixfv(GLint location,
1013 GLsizei count,
1014 GLboolean transpose,
1015 const GLfloat *value)
1016{
1017 const gl::VariableLocation &locationInfo = mState.getUniformLocations()[location];
1018 const gl::LinkedUniform &linkedUniform = mState.getUniforms()[locationInfo.index];
1019
1020 for (gl::ShaderType shaderType : gl::AllGLES2ShaderTypes())
1021 {
1022 DefaultUniformBlock &uniformBlock = mDefaultUniformBlocks[shaderType];
1023 const sh::BlockMemberInfo &layoutInfo = uniformBlock.uniformLayout[location];
1024
1025 // Assume an offset of -1 means the block is unused.
1026 if (layoutInfo.offset == -1)
1027 {
1028 continue;
1029 }
1030
1031 SetFloatUniformMatrixGLSL<cols, rows>::Run(
1032 locationInfo.arrayIndex, linkedUniform.getArraySizeProduct(), count, transpose, value,
1033 uniformBlock.uniformData.data() + layoutInfo.offset);
1034
1035 mDefaultUniformBlocksDirty.set(shaderType);
1036 }
1037}
1038

1040 GLsizei count,

1045}

1125
1126angle::Result ProgramMtl::setupDraw(const gl::Context *glContext,
1127 mtl::RenderCommandEncoder *cmdEncoder,
1128 const mtl::RenderPipelineDesc &pipelineDesc,
1129 bool pipelineDescChanged,
1130 bool forceTexturesSetting,
1131 bool uniformBuffersDirty,
1132 bool transformFeedbackDraw)
1133{
1134 ContextMtl *context = mtl::GetImpl(glContext);
1135 if (pipelineDescChanged)
1136 {
1137 // Render pipeline state needs to be changed
1138 id<MTLRenderPipelineState> pipelineState = nil;
1139 if (transformFeedbackDraw)
1140 {
1141 mtl::RenderPipelineDesc xfbPipelineDesc = mtl::RenderPipelineDesc(pipelineDesc);
1142 xfbPipelineDesc.rasterizationType = mtl::RenderPipelineRasterization::Disabled;
1143 pipelineState =
1144 mMetalXfbRenderPipelineCache->getRenderPipelineState(context, xfbPipelineDesc);
1145 }
1146 else
1147 {
1148 pipelineState = mMetalRenderPipelineCache.getRenderPipelineState(context, pipelineDesc);
1149 }
1150 if (!pipelineState)
1151 {
1152 // Error already logged inside getRenderPipelineState()
1153 return angle::Result::Stop;
1154 }
1155 cmdEncoder->setRenderPipelineState(pipelineState);
1156
1157 // We need to rebind uniform buffers & textures also
1158 mDefaultUniformBlocksDirty.set();
1159 mSamplerBindingsDirty.set();
1160
1161 // Cache current shader variant references for easier querying.
1162 mCurrentShaderVariants[gl::ShaderType::Vertex] =
1163 &mVertexShaderVariants[pipelineDesc.rasterizationType];
1164 mCurrentShaderVariants[gl::ShaderType::Fragment] =
1165 pipelineDesc.rasterizationEnabled()
1166 ? &mFragmentShaderVariants[pipelineDesc.emulateCoverageMask]
1167 : nullptr;
1168
1169 }
1170
1171 ANGLE_TRY(commitUniforms(context, cmdEncoder));
1172 ANGLE_TRY(updateTextures(glContext, cmdEncoder, forceTexturesSetting));
1173
1174 if (uniformBuffersDirty || pipelineDescChanged)
1175 {
1176 ANGLE_TRY(updateUniformBuffers(context, cmdEncoder, pipelineDesc));
1177 }
1178
1179 return angle::Result::Continue;
1180}
1181
1182bool ProgramMtl::hasFlatAttribute()
1183{
1184 return mHasFlatAttribute;
1185}
1186
1187angle::Result ProgramMtl::commitUniforms(ContextMtl *context, mtl::RenderCommandEncoder *cmdEncoder)
1188{
1189 for (gl::ShaderType shaderType : gl::AllGLES2ShaderTypes())
1190 {
1191 if (!mDefaultUniformBlocksDirty[shaderType] || !mCurrentShaderVariants[shaderType])
1192 {
1193 continue;
1194 }
1195 DefaultUniformBlock &uniformBlock = mDefaultUniformBlocks[shaderType];
1196
1197 if (!uniformBlock.uniformData.size())
1198 {
1199 continue;
1200 }
1201 //If we exceed the default uniform max size, try to allocate a buffer. Worst case
1202 //scenario, fall back on a large setBytes.
1203 bool needsCommitUniform = true;
1204 if(uniformBlock.uniformData.size() > mtl::kDefaultUniformsMaxSize)
1205 {
1206 //Allocate a new buffer pool if first time through.
1207 mtl::BufferPool * pool = getBufferPool(context);
1208 if(!pool)
1209 {
1210 ASSERT(!"Could not allocate a buffer pool to hold a large uniform group.");
1211 }
1212 else
1213 {
1214 pool->releaseInFlightBuffers(context);
1215 //Create a new ref and copy uniform data.
1216 mtl::BufferRef refOut;
1217 size_t offsetOut;
1218 uint8_t * ptrOut;
1219 ANGLE_TRY(pool->allocate(context, uniformBlock.uniformData.size(), &ptrOut, &refOut, &offsetOut));
1220 memcpy(ptrOut, uniformBlock.uniformData.data(), uniformBlock.uniformData.size());
1221 //Send data to the shader.
1222 cmdEncoder->setBuffer(shaderType, refOut, (uint32_t)offsetOut, mtl::kDefaultUniformsBindingIndex);
1223 ANGLE_TRY(pool->commit(context));
1224 needsCommitUniform = false;
1225
1226 }
1227
1228 }
1229 if(needsCommitUniform)
1230 {
1231 ASSERT(uniformBlock.uniformData.size() <= mtl::kDefaultUniformsMaxSize);
1232 cmdEncoder->setBytes(shaderType, uniformBlock.uniformData.data(),
1233 uniformBlock.uniformData.size(), mtl::kDefaultUniformsBindingIndex);
1234 }
1235
1236 mDefaultUniformBlocksDirty.reset(shaderType);
1237 }
1238
1239 return angle::Result::Continue;
1240}
1241
1242angle::Result ProgramMtl::updateTextures(const gl::Context *glContext,
1243 mtl::RenderCommandEncoder *cmdEncoder,
1244 bool forceUpdate)
1245{
1246 ContextMtl *contextMtl = mtl::GetImpl(glContext);
1247 const auto &glState = glContext->getState();
1248 const gl::ProgramExecutable *executable = glContext->getState().getProgramExecutable();
1249
1250 const gl::ActiveTexturesCache &completeTextures = glState.getActiveTexturesCache();
1251 const gl::ActiveTextureTypeArray &textureTypes = executable->getActiveSamplerTypes();
1252
1253 for (gl::ShaderType shaderType : gl::AllGLES2ShaderTypes())
1254 {
1255 if ((!mSamplerBindingsDirty[shaderType] && !forceUpdate) ||
1256 !mCurrentShaderVariants[shaderType])
1257 {
1258 continue;
1259 }
1260
1261 const mtl::TranslatedShaderInfo &shaderInfo =
1262 mCurrentShaderVariants[shaderType]->translatedSrcInfo ? *mCurrentShaderVariants[shaderType]->translatedSrcInfo : mMslShaderTranslateInfo[shaderType];
1263 bool hasDepthSampler = false;
1264
1265 for (uint32_t textureIndex = 0; textureIndex < mState.getSamplerBindings().size();
1266 ++textureIndex)
1267 {
1268 const gl::SamplerBinding &samplerBinding = mState.getSamplerBindings()[textureIndex];
1269 const mtl::SamplerBinding &mslBinding = shaderInfo.actualSamplerBindings[textureIndex];
1270 if (mslBinding.textureBinding >= mtl::kMaxShaderSamplers)
1271 {
1272 // No binding assigned
1273 continue;
1274 }
1275
1276
1277 for (uint32_t arrayElement = 0; arrayElement < samplerBinding.boundTextureUnits.size();
1278 ++arrayElement)
1279 {
1280 GLuint textureUnit = samplerBinding.boundTextureUnits[arrayElement];
1281 gl::Texture *texture = completeTextures[textureUnit];
1282 gl::Sampler *sampler = contextMtl->getState().getSampler(textureUnit);
1283 gl::TextureType textureType = textureTypes[textureUnit];
1284 uint32_t textureSlot = mslBinding.textureBinding + arrayElement;
1285 uint32_t samplerSlot = mslBinding.samplerBinding + arrayElement;
1286 if (!texture)
1287 {
1288 ANGLE_TRY(contextMtl->getIncompleteTexture(glContext, textureType, &texture));
1289 }
1290 const gl::SamplerState *samplerState =
1291 sampler ? &sampler->getSamplerState() : &texture->getSamplerState();
1292 TextureMtl *textureMtl = mtl::GetImpl(texture);
1293 if (samplerBinding.format == gl::SamplerFormat::Shadow)
1294 {
1295 hasDepthSampler = true;
1296 mShadowCompareModes[textureSlot] = mtl::MslGetShaderShadowCompareMode(
1297 samplerState->getCompareMode(), samplerState->getCompareFunc());
1298 }
1299
1300 ANGLE_TRY(textureMtl->bindToShader(glContext, cmdEncoder, shaderType, sampler,
1301 textureSlot, samplerSlot));
1302 } // for array elements
1303 } // for sampler bindings
1304
1305 if (hasDepthSampler)
1306 {
1307 cmdEncoder->setData(shaderType, mShadowCompareModes,
1308 mtl::kShadowSamplerCompareModesBindingIndex);
1309 }
1310 } // for shader types
1311
1312 return angle::Result::Continue;
1313}
1314
1315angle::Result ProgramMtl::updateUniformBuffers(ContextMtl *context,
1316 mtl::RenderCommandEncoder *cmdEncoder,
1317 const mtl::RenderPipelineDesc &pipelineDesc)
1318{
1319 const std::vector<gl::InterfaceBlock> &blocks = mState.getUniformBlocks();
1320 if (blocks.empty())
1321 {
1322 return angle::Result::Continue;
1323 }
1324
1325 // This array is only used inside this function and its callees.
1326 ScopedAutoClearVector<uint32_t> scopeArrayClear(&mArgumentBufferRenderStageUsages);
1327 ScopedAutoClearVector<std::pair<mtl::BufferRef, uint32_t>> scopeArrayClear2(
1328 &mLegalizedOffsetedUniformBuffers);
1329 mArgumentBufferRenderStageUsages.resize(blocks.size());
1330 mLegalizedOffsetedUniformBuffers.resize(blocks.size());
1331
1332 ANGLE_TRY(legalizeUniformBufferOffsets(context, blocks));
1333
1334 const gl::State &glState = context->getState();
1335
1336 for (gl::ShaderType shaderType : gl::AllGLES2ShaderTypes())
1337 {
1338 const mtl::TranslatedShaderInfo &shaderInfo =
1339 mCurrentShaderVariants[shaderType]->translatedSrcInfo ? *mCurrentShaderVariants[shaderType]->translatedSrcInfo : mMslShaderTranslateInfo[shaderType];
1340 if (shaderInfo.hasUBOArgumentBuffer)
1341 {
1342 ANGLE_TRY(
1343 encodeUniformBuffersInfoArgumentBuffer(context, cmdEncoder, blocks, shaderType));
1344 }
1345 else
1346 {
1347 ANGLE_TRY(bindUniformBuffersToDiscreteSlots(context, cmdEncoder, blocks, shaderType));
1348 }
1349 } // for shader types
1350
1351 // After encode the uniform buffers into an argument buffer, we need to tell Metal that
1352 // the buffers are being used by what shader stages.
1353 for (uint32_t bufferIndex = 0; bufferIndex < blocks.size(); ++bufferIndex)
1354 {
1355 const gl::InterfaceBlock &block = blocks[bufferIndex];
1356 const gl::OffsetBindingPointer<gl::Buffer> &bufferBinding =
1357 glState.getIndexedUniformBuffer(block.binding);
1358 if (bufferBinding.get() == nullptr)
1359 {
1360 continue;
1361 }
1362
1363 // Remove any other stages other than vertex and fragment.
1364 uint32_t stages = mArgumentBufferRenderStageUsages[bufferIndex] &
1365 (mtl::kRenderStageVertex | mtl::kRenderStageFragment);
1366
1367 if (stages == 0)
1368 {
1369 continue;
1370 }
1371
1372 cmdEncoder->useResource(mLegalizedOffsetedUniformBuffers[bufferIndex].first,
1373 MTLResourceUsageRead, static_cast<mtl::RenderStages>(stages));
1374 }
1375
1376 return angle::Result::Continue;
1377}
1378
1379angle::Result ProgramMtl::legalizeUniformBufferOffsets(
1380 ContextMtl *context,
1381 const std::vector<gl::InterfaceBlock> &blocks)
1382{
1383 const gl::State &glState = context->getState();
1384
1385 for (uint32_t bufferIndex = 0; bufferIndex < blocks.size(); ++bufferIndex)
1386 {
1387 const gl::InterfaceBlock &block = blocks[bufferIndex];
1388 const gl::OffsetBindingPointer<gl::Buffer> &bufferBinding =
1389 glState.getIndexedUniformBuffer(block.binding);
1390
1391 if (bufferBinding.get() == nullptr)
1392 {
1393 continue;
1394 }
1395
1396 BufferMtl *bufferMtl = mtl::GetImpl(bufferBinding.get());
1397 size_t srcOffset = std::min<size_t>(bufferBinding.getOffset(), bufferMtl->size());
1398 size_t offsetModulo = srcOffset % mtl::kUniformBufferSettingOffsetMinAlignment;
1399 if (offsetModulo)
1400 {
1401 ConversionBufferMtl *conversion =
1402 bufferMtl->getUniformConversionBuffer(context, offsetModulo);
1403 // Has the content of the buffer has changed since last conversion?
1404 if (conversion->dirty)
1405 {
1406 const uint8_t *srcBytes = bufferMtl->getClientShadowCopyData(context);
1407 srcBytes += offsetModulo;
1408 size_t sizeToCopy = bufferMtl->size() - offsetModulo;
1409 size_t bytesToAllocate = roundUp<size_t>(sizeToCopy, 16u);
1410 ANGLE_TRY(StreamUniformBufferData(
1411 context, &conversion->data, srcBytes, bytesToAllocate, sizeToCopy,
1412 &conversion->convertedBuffer, &conversion->convertedOffset));
1413#ifndef NDEBUG
1414 ANGLE_MTL_OBJC_SCOPE
1415 {
1416 conversion->convertedBuffer->get().label = [NSString
1417 stringWithFormat:@"Converted from %p offset=%zu", bufferMtl, offsetModulo];
1418 }
1419#endif
1420 conversion->dirty = false;
1421 }
1422 // reuse the converted buffer
1423 mLegalizedOffsetedUniformBuffers[bufferIndex].first = conversion->convertedBuffer;
1424 mLegalizedOffsetedUniformBuffers[bufferIndex].second =
1425 static_cast<uint32_t>(conversion->convertedOffset + srcOffset - offsetModulo);
1426 }
1427 else
1428 {
1429 mLegalizedOffsetedUniformBuffers[bufferIndex].first = bufferMtl->getCurrentBuffer();
1430 mLegalizedOffsetedUniformBuffers[bufferIndex].second =
1431 static_cast<uint32_t>(bufferBinding.getOffset());
1432 }
1433 }
1434 return angle::Result::Continue;
1435}
1436
1437angle::Result ProgramMtl::bindUniformBuffersToDiscreteSlots(
1438 ContextMtl *context,
1439 mtl::RenderCommandEncoder *cmdEncoder,
1440 const std::vector<gl::InterfaceBlock> &blocks,
1441 gl::ShaderType shaderType)
1442{
1443 const gl::State &glState = context->getState();
1444 for (uint32_t bufferIndex = 0; bufferIndex < blocks.size(); ++bufferIndex)
1445 {
1446 const gl::InterfaceBlock &block = blocks[bufferIndex];
1447 const gl::OffsetBindingPointer<gl::Buffer> &bufferBinding =
1448 glState.getIndexedUniformBuffer(block.binding);
1449
1450 if (bufferBinding.get() == nullptr || !block.activeShaders().test(shaderType))
1451 {
1452 continue;
1453 }
1454
1455 uint32_t actualBufferIdx =
1456 mMslShaderTranslateInfo[shaderType].actualUBOBindings[bufferIndex];
1457
1458 if (actualBufferIdx >= mtl::kMaxShaderBuffers)
1459 {
1460 continue;
1461 }
1462
1463 mtl::BufferRef mtlBuffer = mLegalizedOffsetedUniformBuffers[bufferIndex].first;
1464 uint32_t offset = mLegalizedOffsetedUniformBuffers[bufferIndex].second;
1465 cmdEncoder->setBuffer(shaderType, mtlBuffer, offset, actualBufferIdx);
1466 }
1467 return angle::Result::Continue;
1468}
1469angle::Result ProgramMtl::encodeUniformBuffersInfoArgumentBuffer(
1470 ContextMtl *context,
1471 mtl::RenderCommandEncoder *cmdEncoder,
1472 const std::vector<gl::InterfaceBlock> &blocks,
1473 gl::ShaderType shaderType)
1474{
1475 const gl::State &glState = context->getState();
1476 ASSERT(mCurrentShaderVariants[shaderType]->translatedSrcInfo);
1477 const mtl::TranslatedShaderInfo &shaderInfo =
1478 *mCurrentShaderVariants[shaderType]->translatedSrcInfo;
1479
1480 // Encode all uniform buffers into an argument buffer.
1481 ProgramArgumentBufferEncoderMtl &bufferEncoder =
1482 mCurrentShaderVariants[shaderType]->uboArgBufferEncoder;
1483
1484 mtl::BufferRef argumentBuffer;
1485 size_t argumentBufferOffset;
1486 bufferEncoder.bufferPool.releaseInFlightBuffers(context);
1487 ANGLE_TRY(bufferEncoder.bufferPool.allocate(
1488 context, bufferEncoder.metalArgBufferEncoder.get().encodedLength, nullptr, &argumentBuffer,
1489 &argumentBufferOffset));
1490
1491 [bufferEncoder.metalArgBufferEncoder setArgumentBuffer:argumentBuffer->get()
1492 offset:argumentBufferOffset];
1493
1494 constexpr gl::ShaderMap<MTLRenderStages> kShaderStageMap = {
1495 {gl::ShaderType::Vertex, mtl::kRenderStageVertex},
1496 {gl::ShaderType::Fragment, mtl::kRenderStageFragment},
1497 };
1498
1499 auto mtlRenderStage = kShaderStageMap[shaderType];
1500
1501 for (uint32_t bufferIndex = 0; bufferIndex < blocks.size(); ++bufferIndex)
1502 {
1503 const gl::InterfaceBlock &block = blocks[bufferIndex];
1504 const gl::OffsetBindingPointer<gl::Buffer> &bufferBinding =
1505 glState.getIndexedUniformBuffer(block.binding);
1506
1507 if (bufferBinding.get() == nullptr || !block.activeShaders().test(shaderType))
1508 {
1509 continue;
1510 }
1511
1512 mArgumentBufferRenderStageUsages[bufferIndex] |= mtlRenderStage;
1513
1514 uint32_t actualBufferIdx = shaderInfo.actualUBOBindings[bufferIndex];
1515 if (actualBufferIdx >= mtl::kMaxShaderBuffers)
1516 {
1517 continue;
1518 }
1519
1520 mtl::BufferRef mtlBuffer = mLegalizedOffsetedUniformBuffers[bufferIndex].first;
1521 uint32_t offset = mLegalizedOffsetedUniformBuffers[bufferIndex].second;
1522 [bufferEncoder.metalArgBufferEncoder setBuffer:mtlBuffer->get()
1523 offset:offset
1524 atIndex:actualBufferIdx];
1525 }
1526
1527 ANGLE_TRY(bufferEncoder.bufferPool.commit(context));
1528
1529 cmdEncoder->setBuffer(shaderType, argumentBuffer, static_cast<uint32_t>(argumentBufferOffset),
1530 mtl::kUBOArgumentBufferBindingIndex);
1531 return angle::Result::Continue;
1532}
1533
1534} // namespace rx
